Summary: Watching lunar eclipse, light rose frm behind trees at range of 100 feet
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Canterbury
There were no other sightings in Canterbury on or around August 31st 1996
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness was sitting on front lawn watching lunar eclipse when his cat which he did not know had followed him outdoors, began to "Wail". Turnig, he saw a bright light behind his house which rose from behind some trees. Didn't know what to make of it at first. Object had irregular shape, coppery color with mixed colors, bright white across bottom, vibrational field of motion, silent, hovering over the trees. Witness felt intrigued, calmness, a sense of wonder and connection. He wanted to "Engage" it. In his recorded description he siad he could see the outline of a figure inside but due to "vibrational" conditional of object could not make out any details. Object sped away very quickly. Estimated distance from witness 100 feet.
